ing: 6 slices pancetta, cut into small strips
1 dash hot pepper sauce (such as TabascoÂ®), or to taste (optional)
des: "This is a delicious way to kick up the flavor in what traditionally can be a bland dish. Pancetta adds a wonderful flavor that will win over even the pickiest eaters. This recipe is also great for those of you on low-carb diets."
ins: Cook and stir pancetta in a large skillet over medium heat until slightly browned, about 5 minutes. Add onion, garlic, salt, and black pepper; cook until onions become translucent, 5 to 10 minutes. Cook and stir cabbage with pancetta mixture until slightly softened, 5 minutes. Add soy sauce and hot pepper sauce; cook until cabbage is tender, about 10 more minutes.
